award_title: Collaborative Research: Polarimetric Asteroseismology of Massive Hot Stars
subject: Making stellar modeling code available
body:
Derek—

Your polarimetric work on massive stars involves some serious computational modeling, and I'm guessing that code lives mostly in papers and local drives.

Ouro wraps research workflows in a lightweight API so other astronomers can actually use what you've built instead of re-coding it from scratch. It's becoming an expectation that methods are reusable—we just make it easier to show you're delivering on that.

Worth a quick call? And happy holidays.

Best,
Matt

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
